sentence.Network_en: Slowly and stealthily, someone was creeping up the stairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人正蹑手蹑脚地上楼。

sentence.Network_en: I heard my landlady creeping stealthily up to my door.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到我的女房东偷偷地来到我的门前.

sentence.Network_en: They peeped out stealthily from a corner of the wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们几个在墙角处鬼头鬼脑地往外探望.

entry.tran: 悄悄的;偷偷摸摸的;鬼鬼祟祟的
entry.def: Stealthy actions or movements are performed quietly and carefully, so that no one will notice what you are doing.

example.ex: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor...
example.tran: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

example.ex: It was a stealthy sound made by someone anxious not to be heard.
example.tran: 这是有人不想让别人听到而偷偷摸摸移动的声音。

auth_sentence.content: She giggled stealthily and took his hand.
auth_sentence.res_content: She giggled stealthily and took his hand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She giggled stealthily and took his hand.

auth_sentence.content: But sometimes it creeps up as stealthily as spring, slowly warming your bones.
auth_sentence.res_content: But sometimes it creeps up as stealthily as spring, slowly warming your bones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But sometimes it creeps up as stealthily as spring, slowly warming your bones.

auth_sentence.content: No arising at dawn and stealthily persuing a live prey in its own environment nope.
auth_sentence.res_content: No arising at dawn and stealthily persuing a live prey in its own environment nope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No arising at dawn and stealthily persuing a live prey in its own environment nope.

sentences.en: Stealthily we approached the enemy’s camp.
sentences.cn: 我们偷偷地摸向敌人的营地。

sentences.en: The thief stealthily stole into the house.
sentences.cn: 那个贼悄悄地潜入房子。

sentences.en: I heard my landlady creeping stealthily up to my door.
sentences.cn: 我听到我的女房东偷偷地来到我的门前。
